name: Soul & Body
description:
PLS PLAY IN FULLSCREEN FOR FULL ENJOYMENT

a game made for gmtk game jam 2021 by the gamedev parrots

in 12 hrs i think so.in this game you are a soul trying to fuse 

with your body but youre also "joined" with the body the jump

is done at the same time and you cannot get too far away 

from the body, so if you try to break the maximum distance you

and your body can handle game over thanks for downloading 

ART: ahiroop Kar gamedev, potatoes, and timepass

coding: timepass

game design: timepass

basically, everything besides art is made by me, timepass

this was made in 1 day  (1 day means some 7 hrs) lol bc I had a blackout and the whole project was gone and my team left the jam

pls rate it max :)

Controls :

MOVEMENT :

BODY : LEFT - A ; RIGHT - D

SOUL : RIGHT - right arrow ; left - left arrow

jump:

space

interaction:

button : e

portal : touch

pressure pad : collide

use exit door : p

all the best
